mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, datagroupId, userId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO im_user_datagroup ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, datagroupId, userId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{datagroupId}, #{userId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE im_user_datagroup
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
datagroupId = #{datagroupId},
userId = #{userId},
WHERE id = #{id}

creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
datagroupId = #{map.datagroupId},
userId = #{map.userId},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO im_user_datagroup ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, datagroupId, userId ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.datagroupId}, #{map.userId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM im_user_datagroup
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND datagroupId like CONCAT('%', #{datagroupId} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
